Question: During the late 1970s and early 1980s, this person converted to Christianity.
Hints: Guthrie had been a revelation to this person and was the biggest influence on his early performances.
This person's embrace of born-again Christianity was unpopular with some of his fans and fellow musicians.
On August 28 at Forest Hills Tennis Stadium, the group was heckled by an audience still annoyed by this person's electric sound.
